channel.title: World war 3?
channel.description:
the question is will world war 3 start from this little war between israel and that other country with a weird name lahemabad or something anyways here is whos teaming if we do go into world war 3
(we will have the whole us and the aussies and london (Britian) japan and like 5 other places)
(them (the whole other part of the world)
if we do go into world war 3 will we win?
(i didn't know how to post a poll so post here what you think)
will we win? with about 10 states or wahtever on our side
or will they win with about 80 percent of the world on their side :confused: :| :|

item.title: World war 3?
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

Not to mention saudi arabia has like 200 fighter jets. Like 50 of those are always in the sky protecting the country from any terrorist attack. Anyways if Saudi Arabia is bombed then the US will be screwed. Saudi Arabia holds the biggest masq (worshipping area) and is considered the most religious place for all muslims. Thus if the US bombs it-every single muslim country would be out to get the US. And trust me theres alot, islam is like the biggest religion in the world right now.

Read full topic

well actually we’d lose cause saudia arabia is our main place to get oil and were funding them for nuclear stuff pretty much from buying all this war so were buying our own death. pretty much.

item.title: World war 3?
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

Learn to spell.
Its called lebanon.

And if i understood your topic, then i think we would not win.
Yes we would have Europe and Australia maybe Japan and China (Maybe) but they would have Saudi Arabia, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Iraq, Somalia, Somewhat of India, Somewhat of Africa and some others that dont come to mind. Some of those countrys/continents may not HELP ALOT or NOT EVEN AT ALL.

Ok, ok only 2 of those countrys have nuclear capabilitys (Pakistan and India) but if Saudi Arabia declares war then the US is screwed. Even if it doesnt declare war but just stops shipping oil then the US is screwed. The US pays about $4 per litre for oil for its military vehicles (Shipping the oil to places like Iraq is constly). Anyways if Saudi Arabia stops shipping oil then the US will run out of oil in the next 2-3 months. Its econamy will fall. Its military capability will fall. Thus making the US very, very vulnerable. So i think there will not be any ww3. Most of the countrys that have aton of oil underneath them are arab countrys. And if there was a ww3 those arab countrys would go to war. Meaning the rest of the world is screwed.

Read full topic
